0: We choose to eat elsewhere that had better quality with a better price
Appropriately priced for the quality of the service and atmosphere
The front desk was efficient and acomdating to an unusual request I had regarding charging for parking
Facilities good parking expensive and small
Nice hotel but you pay for it
When I arrived I was offered a upgrade with no extra charge
We were charged for things that we were told were free due to our Rewards Loyalty program upon Check In
The service from the staff was first rate
1: I ’m actually not cheap and fine paying but it became a joke and I would rather leave then pay for water at this point
Heres the real kicker they put me in just a standard room and the extra charge was for a premium room
After complaining the rate of room was reduced but that did not compensate for a stay in an unacceptable room

I do think that the restaurants were overpriced for what was served and the service slow however the hotel was completely booked because of the large conferences that were in attendance at the time and perhaps that was why
The food and beverage prices were slightly higher for the quality size than what I ’m used to and I travel frequently
Some people were charged for a weeks worth of parking even though they did not have a car there
The dropof impacted no one negatively except for Omni missing out on another meal charge from me
For the cost per night parking should be free
Room confusion they still charge for wifi alot
The general manager wrote me a letter and took the macaroni and cheese off my bill which was not at all intended as I was happy to pay for it but she insisted
